name: Spy vs Spy (itch)
description:
This game was intended to participate in Pizza Jam but I didn't finish in time :(  . Anyways, this game is a two player game in which you must analyze every character until you find the enemy spy.

Each player is a different spy each time!

A guess wrong and you lose a life, a guess right and you win!

How to Play:

You will be shown your spy one by one and then, you must find the spy in a map full of people. The way you find him is by looking at which character is different than the others( movement etc.) Since YOU control the spy.

Controls:

Mouse t select and guess

P1 Controls:

WASD

Click CTRL to guess

P2 Controls:

Arrow keys

Click SPACE to guess

Other:

This was made in Processing
